name: anf-backend
description: Backend server for ANF Academy online classes

scripts.init-db: node -e "const Database = require('./models/database'); const db = new Database(); db.connect().then(() => db.initializeTables()).then(() => { console.log('Database initialized successfully'); process.exit(0); }).catch(err => { console.error('Database initialization failed:', err); process.exit(1); });"

author: ANF Academy
